alert.note: Alert for Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rainfall will impact portions of western and central Flagler County through 500 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking multiple thunderstorms with heavy rainfall over western Flagler County, moving slowly north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Bunnell, Andalusia and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
